page.title: 13Language - Expressions
page.content: Some of the modern words & expressions which we use in our locality today would not be understood by a person who lived in a different era. Here are some of the words & expressions we use today & what they mean. WALLY - A Wally is a stupid, thick person that behaves in a silly way. WICKED - Wicked means something that is good, dangerous & more outstanding than something else. PUNK - A Punk is a person that usually dresses in skin tight bleached jeans & has coloured spiky hair. ACE - Is something that is exceedingly good, better than most things. HIPPY - A Hippy is someone who has long hair and wears flared jeans. STEAM - Steam means when you run fast.
